title: Dashboard Loader with Error Handling
description: Create a dashboard loader that fetches three independent data sources. If one fails, the others should still succeed and display their data.
hints: Use supervisorScope so one failure doesn't cancel others
Wrap each async in runCatching to safely handle exceptions
Use getOrNull() and exceptionOrNull() to extract results and errors

testCases.expectedBehavior: news is null, errors contains the news error
